Parameters: PrintStream: The PrintWriter where you would like output to go.
PrintStreamPrinter(java.io.PrintStream).Description: Create a new Printer that sends to a PrintWriter object.

println(java.lang.String).Description: Write a line of text to the output. There is no need to terminate the given string with a newline.

ClassDesc: Implementation of a @B_android#util#Printer_E@ that sends its output to a @B_java#io#PrintStream_E@.
